SEARCH
Package controller.controllerGame

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
controller.controllerGame.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
Controller class for managing the game logic. It acts as an intermediary between the GameModel and GameView.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    GameController(GameView gameView, String name, String jobChoice)
    Constructs a GameController with the specified GameView, hero name, and job choice.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameController

      public GameController(GameView gameView, String name, String jobChoice)
      Constructs a GameController with the specified GameView, hero name, and job choice.
      Parameters:
      gameView - the GameView instance associated with this controller
      name - the name of the hero
      jobChoice - the job choice of the hero

  • Method Details

    • getGameModel

      public GameModel getGameModel()
      Gets the GameModel instance managed by this controller.
      Returns:
      the GameModel instance

    • getGameView

      public GameView getGameView()
      Gets the GameView instance associated with this controller.
      Returns:
      the GameView instance

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts the game by initializing the game model and updating the view. Redirects the standard output to the game information stream.

    • end

      public void end()
      Ends the game by resetting the standard output and removing command handlers.

    • isEnd

      public boolean isEnd()
      Checks if the game has ended. Delegates to the game model to determine if the game has reached an end state (either won or lost).
      Returns:
      true if the game has ended, false otherwise

    • isWon

      public boolean isWon()
      Checks if the game has been won by the player. Delegates to the game model to determine if the winning conditions have been satisfied.
      Returns:
      true if the player has won the game, false otherwise

    • getGameWonMessage

      public String getGameWonMessage()
      Gets the message to display when the player wins the game. Retrieves the winning message from the game model, typically congratulating the player on their victory.
      Returns:
      a string containing the game won message

    • getGameLostMessage

      public String getGameLostMessage()
      Gets the message to display when the player loses the game. Retrieves the losing message from the game model, typically explaining the cause of defeat.
      Returns:
      a string containing the game lost message

    • getScore

      public long getScore()
      Gets the player's final score. Retrieves the calculated score from the game model based on the player's performance throughout the game.
      Returns:
      the player's score as a long value

    • updateCurrentLocation

      public void updateCurrentLocation()
      Updates the current location in the game. Loads the location and updates the corresponding view.

    • getJobs

      public static ArrayList<String> getJobs()
      Gets the list of available jobs in the game.
      Returns:
      a list of job names

    • getHeroController

      public HeroController getHeroController()
      Gets the HeroController instance associated with the game's hero.
      Returns:
      the HeroController instance
